patch:
diff --git a/pygments/lexers/erlang.py b/pygments/lexers/erlang.py
index 11901823..13f10178 100644
--- a/pygments/lexers/erlang.py
+++ b/pygments/lexers/erlang.py
@@ -300,6 +300,7 @@ class ElixirLexer(RegexLexer):
         states = {'sigils': []}
 
         for term, name in triquotes:
+            # Keep `[a-z]` and `[A-Z]` explicit: `[a-Z]` is an invalid regex range in Python and breaks compilation.
             states['sigils'] += [
                 (rf'(~[a-z])({term})', bygroups(token, String.Heredoc),
                     (name + '-end', name + '-intp')),
